title: Handpicked AA Quality Multicolor 6.5-7mm Freshwater Cultured Pearl Necklace Bracelet and Earrings Set 925 Sterling Silver Clasp

description: FRESHWATER PEARLS - are famous for their unusual colors, peculiar shapes and affordable prices. Freshwater Pearls have a special place in the hearts of millions of shoppers as they offer a fresh, vibrant and fashionable collections of necklaces, earrings, pendants bracelets and rings. Wide variety of freshwater pearls colors offers something for everyone. UNIQUE- The design of these earrings will ensure that you stand out effortlessly. Gift these beautiful earrings to yourself or someone you love. Splendid pearls stand for elegance, sophistication, beauty and style. Wearing a piece of jewelry by Splendid Pearls will certainly complement any attire. PERFECT GIFT- Pearls have been known to be a girl’s best friend for over a century. Throughout time they have and are still being worn by celebrities and influential leaders. Pearl jewelry makes a classic gift for everyone in your life. This set is made with beautiful Cultured Freshwater pearls belongs in every jewelry collection. STYLE- Splendid Pearls was born with a vision and focus for creativity, design and contemporary looks. The styles were created with every consumer in mind. The designers are from all over the globe tying in and surpassing all distinctive styles and the design aspects. QUALITY- The selections of pearls used are hand selected by a leading North American manufacturer with over 30 years’ experience. The most affordable pearls sold today, freshwater pearls are known for baroque shapes, white and pastel body colors and softer luster than akoya (except in the case of rare metallics). With natural pastel colors and shapes that range from perfectly round to free-form baroque, freshwater pearls offer a widest range of options. Common sizes range from 5 mm to 12 mm, but recent advances have led to the development of round and baroque pearls as large as 20 mm. If you are looking for an affordable piece or something more fashion-forward with unique combinations of colors and shapes, shop freshwater pearls.
